dt-api.name: val()
dt-api.summary: Get / set the value of the DateTime instance

type.description: Set the value of the DateTime instance
type.parameter: Flag to indicate if the formatted value should be written into the input element.

type.description: Get the value of the DateTime instance
type.returns: Date instance representing the current date selected within the DateTime instance.

dt-api.description: Get or set the value for the DateTime instance. If the set parameter is provided then a DateTime instance is provided for chaining. If not then the value stored within DateTime is returned as a Date.
